Text: (Commencing Plan A...!)

Y'know, I think it would be cool if I was even more
popular with girls.
Huh?
What?

Plan Aâ€” Ruin my reputation directly. It's simple and
easy, which means it'll work.

But if I'm not careful it'll backfire, like with the
cookie incident. I need to break though this
hero image.

So I'll give Rose the cold shoulder and pick up as
many girls as I can. This is sure to ruin me.

I mean, looking at how awesome and cool I am, having
four or five girlfriends comes with the territory, right?

Even if I did pick up a bunch of girls, it'd make me
look like a dog in the eyes of everyone in this world.
Even like what happened with the Princess...it's all
part of the plan.

Listen to this guy, he makes everyone worry then
opens his mouth and that comes out!
What about us?!

Three or four...said with no shame! But if we hurt
Cid, we'll be seen as the bad guys.

From the tone of their voices, I can feel my
reputation taking a dive. Yes, this is what
I wanted!

I'll be hated by all men in this world. Their
 jealousy, resentment...I'll take it all.

Hey, will you guys be my wingmen and help me get
girls for my harem?

Yeah, sure. I bet any girl you ask out will say "yes"
on the spot!

Of course we'll help. I'll try every trick in
the book!

...I hope you fail! If I see you get turned down,
tonight's dinner will taste even better!

...Even if you succeed, your bad behavior will reach
Rose's ears. I look forward to seeing her kick you to
the curb! Heheh.
Thanks. I guess all you need are friends, huh.

(You guys... This is supposed to be a secret,
so keep it down, will you...)

I went and scouted out some girls that'll probably
agree to go out with you.
A girl from a different class? Is she popular?

Yeah, she's an infirmary student they call the "Angel
Goddess" cause she's so nice.
She'll for sure say yes even if you ask her out, Cid.

(Angel Goddess, huh? And what do they mean by
"even" me?)

(...but, it's a good choice, driven by their
resentment.)

(I've researched all the students who've had enough
character development to have an effect on my side
character lifestyle, but...)

(Nobody has succeeded in asking her out. "I can't
choose" is her trademark rejection line.)
W-Who? If they'll date me, anyone is fine I guess.
Hey, you over there! Heeey!
Huh? Me?

(She's the gentle, chubby type. She looks like
a pushover, but...)

(I don't think it will happen, but if she says yes,
 it won't be very fitting for an extra...)
(There's no use getting hung up on it! Go for broke!)
Hey, you wanna date?
Whaaat?!
(Come on... Give me a look of disgust!)
Y-You're Cid Kagenou, right?

I knew you'd recognize me, I'm kind of famous
around here.

You protected the student president that time...
You got hurt really bad, right? Are you healed?

(Huh? Why is she acting all interested in me?
Who cares about my injury?)
Uhhh, yeah. Thanks for the concern. Anyhowâ€”

I was working in the medical tent so I remember them
bringing you in, covered in blood.
Huh...?

You and the student council president were hugging...
I thought...you two were an item.
We weren't mutually hugging, It was a one-way hug...

What's with that scandalous talk?! You'd better
explain yourself!
Yeah... Ah! W-Wait, this is bad!
Huh?
Long time no see, Cid. How has your injury healed?
Rose...?!
(What's with the timing?!)
Ah...! I-I'll be leaving now...!

(Damn, she ran away! How am I supposed to lower my
reputation now?)
Hm? What were you two talking about?
Y'know, hareâ€”mmm?!
Skel's hand claps over my mouth. What's up with him?

W-We were talking about how Professor Hare's lesson
was pretty tough, right?!
R-Right! His lessons are hella difficult!

The two of them exchange looks and change
the subject.

(These two...! Just because Rose showed up they're
getting all scared about ruining my reputation!)

(How pitiful. But...as a side character, it's a
beautiful display.)

I see. If that is the case, you should have just
asked me.

She reaches out her hand to me, as if to say
"is that so?"

If you don't mind, I can teach you some of the
simpler topics. You two as well.
N-No thank you! We couldn't impose!
P-Please, take your time together!

(They ran out of here just like that infirmary
student did...)
Oh? I'm sorry if I made things awkward...

Well then, shall we? We should use our free
time wisely.
...Y-Yes.

Anyway, you are really serious about your studies.
You understand what true strength is.
No, you're overestimating me.
It's just like you say!
We're so proud of him!
(They came back on purpose, just to flatter me!)
Hehe, you really are quite amazing.

In the end, instead of ruining my reputation with
Rose, it went up.
